Paintbrush Holder: Use the printer's paper tray as a holder for paintbrushes, keeping them organized and easily accessible. This can be a fun and creative way to repurpose a printer that is no longer functional.

Candle Holder: Create a unique candle holder by removing the printer's ink cartridges and placing a candle inside the ink cartridge holder. This can be a great way to upcycle an old printer and add a touch of creativity to your home decor.
Pencil Holder: Use the printer's paper tray as a pencil holder for office supplies, such as pens, pencils, and highlighters. This can be a great way to keep your desk organized and clutter-free.

Soap Dispenser: Repurpose a printer as a soap dispenser by filling the paper tray with soap and using the print head to dispense soap onto your hands. This can be a fun and eco-friendly way to repurpose an old printer.

Bird Feeder: Create a unique bird feeder by attaching a bird feeder to the printer's base and filling it with bird seed. This can be a great way to upcycle an old printer and provide a fun and creative bird feeder for your backyard.
